source_sentence: 願共諸眾生　　往生華藏海　　極樂淨土中○十無差別經云。
translation: He wishes that all sentient beings together will be born in the Huazang ocean, in the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss.

source_sentence: 爾時普賢菩薩(至)以願力故徧世間。
translation: "It was then that the Bodhisattva of Samantabhadra (to) because of the power of his vow, pervaded the whole world.

source_sentence: 願共諸眾生　　往生華藏海　　極樂淨土中南無諸佛法身不可思議無色無形亦無影像為諸眾生現眾多相隨心所樂皆悉令見現大小身一切諸佛南無或為眾生現於短壽或無量劫現住長壽法身常徧十方隨時出現世界一切諸佛南無若或十方不可思議有諸剎海悉能嚴淨或唯能嚴淨一剎土彼一一示現悉皆無餘一切諸佛南無隨眾生心種種難思示現乘法或復宣說一乘法輪一中示現無量方便一切諸佛南無或亦自然成等正覺微少眾生令住佛道或有唯一念之間悉能開悟無數迷眾一切諸佛南無一切世界皆悉應現種種方便化度群生身毛孔中出現化雲無量無邊一切諸佛南無或有語言皆悉周徧隨其意樂演說妙法不可思議諸大劫中調伏無量眾生海一切諸佛南無或有無量莊嚴剎土清淨眾會安隱趺坐如雲悉聚彼中安居十方剎海無不周徧一切諸佛南無諸佛方便不可思議隨眾生心悉現其前徧住種種莊嚴剎土一切剎土悉皆周徧一切諸佛南無十方剎海或剎土中住塵數劫或於一劫或無數劫以大願力種種不同一切諸佛南無現不思議神通力即時徧淨一切剎一切諸佛南無莊嚴剎海皆悉具足心意清淨一切殊勝出現世間一切諸佛南無莊嚴剎海一切皆滅眾生共器世界成染入於涅槃一切諸佛南無清淨剎海一一塵中如微塵數如雲悉聚普賢位中一切菩薩摩訶薩南無見劫差別莊嚴不異不往十方又無量意九地位中一切菩薩摩訶薩南無依剎海心住劫常淨悉起大心無量眾生初地位中一切菩薩摩訶薩南無劫中出生隨彼意樂見於淨染初地之前未斷障故一切信解菩薩摩訶薩南無有清淨心修諸福德剎海染淨悉由心造凡夫位中一切人天南無如是等華藏剎海中毗盧遮那功德王下道場眾會光明名號音聲法輪一不動故無異普徧塵剎海內塵佛境諸佛道場一切海眾至心歸命。
translation: Vishing to be born together with sentient beings in the Huazang ocean In the Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss, there are inconceivable Southern forms of the Buddha's Dharma body that lack form, shape, and image, and which are manifested for sentient beings in numerous ways according to the mind's pleasure, all of them are made to appear as large or small bodies.

source_sentence: 作業皆自心　　為因馳六趣　　由三毒怖畏　販賣諸物命　　養己殺於他　　當墮等活獄　彼壽百千歲　　加刀杖捶打　　死已更復生　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　於父母朋屬　　而生於損壞　　起妄語欺誑　當墮黑繩獄　　黑線絣其身　　如世間解木　鋸發燄熾然　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　以火燒山川　　林木及原野　　燒害諸有情　當墮炎熱獄　　火燄徧燒然　　苦呌聲不絕　兩目無有明　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　謂法說非法　　無根而誹謗　　令他生熱惱　墮極炎熱獄　　是諸罪眾生　　為大火逼切　燒然不暫停　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　於猪羊狐兔　　及餘生類等　　煞害彼無邊　當墮眾合獄　　生彼地獄已　　備受諸楚毒　拷掠滅還生　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　起惡身語意　　讒搆相離間　　如是罪眾生　當墮號呌獄　　復熾猛火燄　　燒然無休息　常發大惡聲　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　若於佛法僧　　及諸貧乏者　　盜竊彼財物　墮大號呌獄　　為火所燒炙　　受最極熱惱　出大猛惡聲　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　於父母師長　　及有德賢者　　起增上殺害　定墮無間獄　　炎熾大火聚　　洞然徹骨髓　長時受極苦　　決定無暫樂(罪報懺悔)　起冤敵鬬諍　　戈戟相殘害　　死墮銅爪獄　其狀極鋒利　　互相而擘裂　　或變為刀杖　競斫刺其身　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　強暴侵他邑　　後墮鐵刺獄　　刺長十六指　削肉而穿骨　　復有大鐵犬　　燄牙甚可怖　噉頂至其踵　　受如是苦報(罪報懺悔)　若陰謀害他　　墮彼劒葉林　　猘狗及鵰鷲　奔逐競分食(罪報懺悔)　若劫奪他財　　當受其極苦　　常吞熱鐵丸　復灌以銅汁(罪報懺悔)　無辜害眾生　　當墮鐵鷹獄　　利爪而悖擊　常時受苦惱(罪報懺悔)　若人好傷殺　　水族諸物命　　後墮鎔銅河　為業火燒煑(罪報懺悔)　若自貪成事　　而掩斥他善　　墮彼鐵磨獄　悲號無救度(罪報懺悔)　若人不饒益　　當受多種形　　兩山夾其身　逼切復加楔(罪報懺悔)　若人說非法　　破壞於橋樑　　鋒刃以為路　驅彼而來往(罪報懺悔)　以甲傷蚤虱　　墮二羺頭山　　相擊死還生　展轉而受苦(罪報懺悔)　依止出離道　　而不護禁戒　　墮煻煨獄中　肢體皆消爛(罪報懺悔)　矯現諸威儀　　苟求邪活命　　死墮糞獄中　為蛆虫咂食(罪報懺悔)　見五穀中虫　　不擇而舂[白*巿]　　墮鐵碓獄中　常為彼舂擣(罪報懺悔)　見他苦生喜　　諂曲多疑惑　　常懷思惡心　作琰魔羅卒(罪報懺悔)　諸苦果種子　　少略而分別　　清淨身語意　畢竟常遠離(罪報懺悔)　若人不樂施　　復盜眾飲食　　墮在癭鬼中　常噉諸糞穢(罪報懺悔)　若有障人施　　於己物生恡　　墮針口鬼中　腹大常飢渴(罪報懺悔)　無嗣慳財物　　不捨不受用　　墮匱乏鬼中　得他亭殘弃(罪報懺悔)　希望他施慧　　自少施生悔　　墮下劣鬼中　常食於涎唾(罪報懺悔)　樂聞他過失　　加惡語宣傳　　墮燄口鬼中　長受諸苦惱(罪報懺悔)　好起諸鬬諍　　無少慈愍心　　墮極醜鬼中　食蜎蠕虫類(罪報懺悔)　恐挾取他財　　得已或少施　　墮極醜鬼中　他怖獲微祀(罪報懺悔)　若人多讌樂　　廣殺諸物命　　自食復與他　後墮羅剎鬼(罪報懺悔)　於供養香華　　或嗅或私取　　由起少貪心　後作尋香鬼(罪報懺悔)　若人相崇奉　　於己有所求　　怒色希彼財　後作猛惡鬼(罪報懺悔)　若人於他娶　　常樂作媒伐　　後懷惡相離　死作部多鬼(罪報懺悔)　若人樂飲酒　　過量復顛酗　　或持勸他人　後作藥叉鬼(罪報懺悔)　於父母師長　　所欲相違背　　後生藥叉宮　勇徤多卒暴(罪報懺悔)　彼慳貪過失　　常生餓鬼中　　苦樂隨自因　是故勿復造(罪報懺悔)又阿含經云。

"The Bhagavān addressed the monks.

source_sentence: 凡夫之人不聞不知說法時節。
translation: "Ordinary people don't hear and don't know the time and place of the teaching.

source_sentence: 比丘當知有八不聞知節人不得修行。
translation: Monks, you should know that there are eight ways in which a person who doesn't hear and know moderation can't practice.
One.
Suppose the Tathāgata appears in the world.
He teaches the Dharma in detail.
He'd be able to reach the Tathāgata's place in nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being is in hell.
They don't hear or see.
They repent of their sins.
Second, there's...
When the Tathāgata again appears in the world.
He'd explain the teaching in detail.
He'd attain nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being is in an animal birth.
They don't hear or see.
They repent of their sins.
Three.
"Furthermore, when the Tathāgata appeared in the world.
He taught the Dharma in detail.
He attained nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being is among hungry ghosts.
They don't hear or see.
They repent of their sins.
Four.
"Furthermore, when the Tathāgata appeared in the world.
He taught the Dharma in detail.
He attained nirvāṇa.
Still, these sentient beings are in the long-lived heaven.
They don't hear or see.
They repent of their sins.
Five.
"Furthermore, when the Tathāgata appeared in the world.
He teaches the Dharma in detail.
He attained nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being was on a marginal ground.
They denigrate the good and the noble.
They created various wrong activities.
They repent of their crimes.
Six.
"Furthermore, when the Tathāgata appeared in the world.
He taught the Dharma in detail.
He attained nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being was born in China.
They aren't endowed with the six faculties.
They also don't discriminate between good and bad qualities.
They repent of their sins.
Seven.
"Again, when the Tathāgata appears, he'll explain the teaching in detail.
He teaches the Dharma in detail.
He would have attained nirvāṇa.
Still, this sentient being is here in China.

source_sentence: 雖復六根完具無所缺漏。
translation: Even though their six faculties are perfectly endowed, there's nothing missing.
Still, those sentient beings have a wrong view of mind and consciousness.
They have no insight.
There's no donor, and there's no taker.
Nor do they have the results of good and evil.
There's no present world or afterlife.
Nor do they have parents.
There are no ascetics, priests, or the like.
Someone who has accomplished the attainment of arhatship ...
He personally makes himself realize it.
He then enjoys himself.
He repents the retribution of his sins.
Eight.
"Furthermore, the Tathāgata doesn't leave the present world.
Nor does he preach.
He'll then reach nirvāṇa.
Also, this sentient being was born in China.
Their six faculties are perfectly endowed.
They're capable of accepting the teaching.
They're perspicacious and highly talented.
They hear the teaching and create an understanding.
They cultivate right views.
They then have things to give and people to accept them.
There's the result of good and evil.
There's the present world and the afterlife.
There are also ascetics, priests, and so forth.

source_sentence: 修正見取證得阿羅漢者。
translation: Those who cultivate right view and grasp realization attain arhatship.
They don't hear or see.
They repent of their sins and retribution.
We've been hindered by ignorance.
We didn't know the causes of the three paths and eight difficult crimes.
Now, we've encountered the site of the path.
We're now able to realize it.
We take refuge in the Tathāgata Vairocana.
and to all the noble sea of sages.
They burn incense and disperse flowers.
It's the cause of the three paths and eight difficult transgressions.
He revealed them and repented.
They dare not conceal them.
This is the cause and condition.

source_sentence: 我及法界眾生海一切業報。
translation: I and the ocean of sentient beings in the Dharma realm will experience the results of all our actions.
May they all be purified.
Next, I'll recite the seal of repentance and extinguish sins.

source_sentence: 唵薩栗末(二合)巴(引)巴眉悉普怛[口*捺]曷捺末日囉也莎曷(應誦三徧)　百劫積集罪　　一念悉盪除　　如火焚枯草　滅盡無有餘　我昔所造諸惡業　　皆由無始貪瞋癡　從身語意之所生　　一切我今皆懺悔懺悔已。
translation: "Om sarimat (two together) ba (citation) ba mei sisiputra [mouth*nar] rhodomoraya sahā (to be recited three times). A hundred eons of accumulated sins are all removed with a single thought, like fire burning dry grass, extinguished without remainder. The bad actions I created in the past all began with greed, anger, and delusion, and arose from my body, speech, and thought. Now, I confess them all and repent.
With all my heart, I return to my roots.
I'll bow to the original Vairocana Buddha.
○(White) All of you listened to this sutra's verse on impermanence.

source_sentence: 始憶容顏華柳色　　誰知鬢髮亂線垂　欲識閻王催命使　　白髮來報遣君知　無常殺鬼難求及　　立追即去不容遲　眼見人人磨滅盡　　自身更得幾多時大方廣佛華嚴經海印道場十重行願常徧禮懺儀卷第九
translation: "When I first remembered my face and the color of flowers and willows, I didn't know that my hair was hanging down in tangled strands. I wanted to know that the king of the jambu trees had called for my life, and that my white hair had come in retribution to send you back to know that it's difficult to find a way to kill a ghost who is impermanent and can't be delayed in going after them.
